function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High incidence rates of respiratory viruses during major epidemics worldwide","Impact":"Strain on health services, excess deaths, massive indirect costs due to absenteeism from work and school","Mitigation":"Implementation of combined public health measures such as personal hygiene, distancing, and barriers","Technologies":"Public health campaigns, educational programs, and infrastructure improvements","People":"General population, healthcare workers, students, workers","Owner":"Government health agencies, educational institutions, employers"},{"Description":"Serious pandemic viral infections such as SARS and avian influenza","Impact":"High death toll, social and economic crisis, disproportionately affects healthcare workers","Mitigation":"Implementation of interventions to reduce viral load, development of agent-specific drugs","Technologies":"Viral load reduction strategies, vaccine development, antiviral drugs","People":"General population, healthcare workers, researchers","Owner":"Government health agencies, pharmaceutical companies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of single measures such as vaccines or antivirals in interrupting the spread of influenza","Impact":"Inability to halt the spread of influenza, potential for widespread outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implementation of combined public health measures, research into novel intervention strategies","Technologies":"Novel intervention strategies, public health campaigns, research and development","People":"General population, healthcare workers, researchers","Owner":"Government health agencies, research institutions, pharmaceutical companies"}]}
